name: Creamy Scalloped Potatoes
author: Philadelphia Cooking Creme
summary: Scalloped potatoes with lots of cheese and a hint of garlic in a creamy sauce are a classic, crowd-pleasing side dish.
ingredients: 1 (270 g) tub PHILADELPHIA Savory Garlic Cooking Creme Cream Cheese Product
3 pounds baking potatoes, peeled, very thinly sliced
⅔ cup KRAFT 100% Grated Parmesan Cheese
directions: Whisk Cooking Creme, milk and pepper until well blended
Layer half each of the potatoes, Cooking Creme mixture and Parmesan in shallow 2-L casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray
or until potatoes are tender and sauce is hot and bubbly, uncovering after 45 min
